abstract: BP outlined to regulators how it would change some of its oil drilling standards in the Gulf of Mexico to prevent another disaster.
snippet: BP outlined to regulators how it would change some of its oil drilling standards in the Gulf of Mexico to prevent another disaster.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — BP said on Friday that it was changing its deepwater drilling standards in the Gulf of Mexico as it seeks to repair its reputation and resume offshore operations after the disastrous oil spill last year.

headline.main: BP to Tighten Deep-Sea Drilling Practices as It Tries to Rebound
headline.print_headline: BP to Tighten Deep-Sea Drilling Practices as It Tries to Rebound
